entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cold Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -24.8°C

Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
